titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting retroactive increases in taxes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2117)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits retroactive increases in the rate of an income or excise tax, except under a presidential declaration of a national emergency.
